text: Andrew Gattine (born November 30, 1962) is an American politician from the state of Maine. He is a member of the Democratic Party, and serves in the Maine House of Representatives, representing the 34th district. Gattine is from Westbrook, Maine. In the 128th Maine Legislature he serves as the House Chair of the Appropriations and Financial Affairs Committee. He previously served as the House Chair of the Health and Human Services Committee. In August 2016, Paul LePage, the Governor of Maine, left an "obscene, threatening" voicemail for Gattine in which he accused Gattine of calling him racist. LePage later stated that he wished he could challenge Gattine to a duel. ==References== ==External links== Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Westbrook, Maine Category:Maine Democrats Category:Members of the Maine House of Representatives Category:1962 births Category:21st-century American politicians
title: Drew Gattine
